TopicTitle: Kerbol's asteroid belt, Version 0.2 Released! Perseus Fixed!

Articles.Content: Yay! I can't wait. If you can do it I would love to help beta test it, and I'm sure that @Agustus would also love to help beta test it!
so um, i loaded up the game and Ginger was surounding Kerbin for some unknown reason, and i spent the rest of the day trying to figure out why :/
is Gingers semi-major axis to low? it could be causing it to for inside of kerbin.... Perhaps change its sma or look to see if any other numbers are causing it to kiss kerban

ive had random star textures suround kerbin before, but never had an actual star coded in be poofed to kerbin, it even had Barry and its moon still orbiting it. and i didnt touch its cfg, since its a stock pf body and isnt in my pack.
I'd be happy to help you convert this to Kopernicus, as some users have been requesting asteroids. Since Kopernicus uses a lot less memory you could add tons of asteroids if you like.
